++ User Notifications

UN gives users [Awareness] of [Change] through ChangeSensitivity. This enables reminders and [Autonomy] of an events and states.

++Types of Alerts
    * Email - Scheduled emails can be set up to routinely send information. Custom fields or attachments can be used so that diagrams can be rendered instead of attaching images. StandardsAbstraction
    * Popup, InformationPopup
    * Instant Messenger ([Chat])
    * Actions - such as shutdown
    * Dialogues
